PHRASE.LANG: La camiseta oficial de la V Celebración de La guerra de las galaxias

This is the official t-shirt of Star Wars Celebration V. If you were there, wanted to be there, knew someone who was there or thought about going but just couldn’t make it, you need this shirt.[#Legal]
C'est le T-shirt officiel de Star Wars Célébration V. Si vous y étiez, vouliez y être, connaissez quelqu’un qui y était ou avez pensé y aller mais sans y arriver, il vous faut ce T-shirt. [#Legal]

Dies ist das offizielle T-Shirt der Star Wars Celebration V. Wenn du dabei warst, dabei sein wolltest, jemanden kennst, der dabei war oder der daran dachte hinzugehen, es aber leider nicht schaffte, dann musst du dieses T-Shirt einfach haben.[#Legal]

Si tratta della t-shirt ufficiale di Star Wars Celebration V. Se eri sul posto, se volevi esserci, se conosci qualcuno che c'era, o anche se ci volevi andare ma non potevi, questa t-shirt non può mancare, nella tua collezione.[#Legal]

Esta es la camiseta oficial de la V Celebración de La guerra de las galaxias. Si estuviste allí, quisiste estar allí, conociste a alguien que estuvio allí o pensaste en ir pero no pudiste, necesitas esta camiseta.[#Legal]

This is the official t-shirt of Star Wars Celebration V. If you were there, wanted to be there, knew someone who was there or thought about going but just couldn’t make it, you need this shirt.[#Legal]
